Room.Name: Lorian Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lorian Parkway, between the Evenborough Inn on the east and the Red-Eye Pub and Grill on the west side of the road.
Room.LongDescription: The Evenborough Inn covers nearly one city block square, catering to the weary adventurers wandering in from the north gate for a good nights rest. On the west side of the road is the Red-Eye Pub and Grill, where many adventurers come to discuss what perils lie ahead should they be venturing out of the town.
